class ClassComponent extends Component {     // ç±»å¼ç»„ä»¶
  static defaultProps = {
    color: "pink"
  };
  render() {
    return (
      <div className="border">
        <h3>ClassComponent</h3>
        <p className={this.props.color}>{this.props.name}</p >
      </div>
    );
  }
}

    <div className="border">
      FunctionComponent

  );

    constructor(props){
        super(props)

    name: propTypes.string
